spatial_accuracy.notes: General wall layout follows the plan, but significant errors exist in window placement and orientation. The window in the top-left bedroom is incorrectly placed on the top wall instead of the left wall. The door to the top-right bedroom is rotated incorrectly relative to the plan's swing.

structural_fidelity.notes: Walls are thick and consistent. However, the living room partition wall is rendered as a standalone segment rather than an integrated structural element of the enclosure. The transition to the entrance area is slightly distorted in length.

furniture_mapping.notes: Bedroom furniture is mostly present but scaled poorly (beds in top-left room are overcrowded). The L-shaped sofa in the living area is mirrored incorrectly compared to the floor plan's orientation.

aesthetic_quality.notes: High quality clay-style render. Isometric camera angle is accurate and lighting is soft and professional. Clean geometry with minimal artifacts.

detected_errors.description: Window in top-left bedroom moved from left exterior wall to top exterior wall.
Door swing for the top-right bedroom is inverted/incorrectly oriented.
L-shaped sofa in the bottom-right living area is mirrored incorrectly.
Beds in the twin bedroom are compressed against the walls, losing the walking space shown in the plan.
Additional clutter/small blocks added to the bottom kitchen counter that were not in original schematic.
